publicationStmt.publisher: Wellcome Library; Bibliotheca Alexandrina; King's College London

msContents.summary: Single folio by unknown author containing astrological charts

list.item: Tables consisting of numbers, days of the week and months.
Circular diagram or compass which reads in centre: هذه الدائرة لمعرفة الابدال في كل يوم فتح الشهر في اي جهة يكونوا

revisionDesc.change: Updated record in accordance with Fihrist standards.
